links.title: Apple Watch Series 4 vs. Fitbit Versa: Which One Should You Buy?
links.description: The answer always depends on what you want. Apple this week revealed its new Apple Watch Series 4 with some of the most significant upgrades since 2015. That includes a larger display, upgraded sensors, and new heart health features. Meanwhile, the Fitbit Versa is a pared-down version of last year's Ionic.

links.title: Apple's bigger-screen iPhones are slammed for being 'sexist'
links.description: When Apple released its iPhone XS line, with screens that range from 5.8 inches to 6.5 inches, they became the company's largest phones yet. But the big screens have triggered a backlash from women who say the device is too large for the average female hand.

links.title: UPDATE: New Apple Watch doesn't have the feature most consumers want
links.description: By Emily Bary New models start at $399 and $499, but consumers seem to want a low price when they buy Apple Watches Apple Inc. has introduced a new Apple Watch, but jazzed-up health features in the smartwatch may not be enough for consumers who don't seem willing to pay up for the priciest Apple wearable.

links.title: Demand for Apple's New $1,100 Phone Appears Strong
links.description: Over the past year, there had been concerns that the iPhone X's $999 starting price tag was a bit steep, since many consumers cited that as a reason they weren't upgrading. Apple's (NASDAQ: AAPL) financial results didn't seem to suffer much, as CEO Tim Cook noted that iPhone X was the most popular model throughout the product cycle.

messages.body: $AAPL Apple has made a new senior hire for its employee health clinics. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-apple-inc-aapl-sets-up-leadership-to-run-employee-health/

links.title: Apple, Inc. (AAPL) Sets Up Leadership to Run Employee Health Clinics
links.description: Apple, Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has brought on M. Osman Akhtar, former COO of a health system nonprofit in Minnesota, to help lead the company's employee health clinics. M. Osman Akhtar will be working on Apple's health clinics and may become involved with other projects. He has not updated his LinkedIn with a specific title for his new position.
